Body: I like the WhosHere app for Apple iPhone iOS. Is there a similar social networking/chat app that uses location / gps to find people to chat or network with for Android? Here's some more info on the application: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/whoshere/id284973016
Title: Is there a WhosHere-style (location-based) social networking chat app for Android?

history.Text: I like the Whoshere app I can use on my ipod touch. Does anyone make a similar social networking/chat app that uses location and settings to find people to chat or network with?Is there an equivalent for the Whoshere iphone application for android? Here's some more info on the application: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/whoshere/id284973016?mt=8DescriptionMeet nearby people + Free texts + Free image messaging + Free Wi-Fi calls = Free Friends.With over *2 million users*, WhosHere is ideal for making new friends, dating, professional networking, or just chatting and swapping pictures with new and interesting people nearby and around the world.Absolutely no need to give out your phone number, email or IM address. That is unless you want to…and meet that new friend or special someone in person.• Check us out on Facebook - myRete.com/fb• Follow-us on Twitter - twitter.com/WhosHere![who's here app][1]  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/EJKci.jpg
Android 2.2 - Is there a Whoshere / social networking chat application equivalent for Android?
